Today, the President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelenskyy presented a new mobile application for military personnel called Army+. It will remove a large amount of paperwork and save time for the military. Electronic reports are currently available in the application, but other documents and secure chat for the military will be added later.??The application is now available in ??
